basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Automation Engineer | System Administrator
basics.summary: Automation-focused Engineer with approximately 3 years of experience in designing and implementing automation frameworks and scripts to optimize engineering processes. Proven ability to reduce manual effort and improve efficiency using Python, Docker, and Jenkins. Experienced in managing Linux-based infrastructure and supporting deployment workflows.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Engineered and maintained automation solutions for ML infrastructure and deployment workflows, improving process efficiency and reducing manual tasks.
highlights: Maintained Linux-based ML training infrastructure and supported deployment workflows using Python, Flask, and TensorBoard to enhance process efficiency.
Engineered AdCognition, an end-to-end ML system, building the Python/TensorFlow training and deployment pipeline for automated ad detection.
Developed RoboGPT using Python and OpenAI APIs to automate robot control in simulations, reducing manual inputs by approximately 30%.
Automated model conversion processes and supported deployment workflows for ML services.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support and developed an award-winning internal automation tool to improve team efficiency.
highlights: Won 1st place in a company-wide Innovation Contest for 'Otis', a JavaScript-based tool that automated repetitive form-filling and email generation workflows.
Created automation scripts using JavaScript/jQuery/RegEx that significantly reduced manual data entry and processing time for the team.

work.name: Trood
work.summary: Contributed to backend services, focusing on inter-service communication and platform integrations.
highlights: Developed Go backend components and gRPC endpoints for inter-service communication.
Integrated a Telegram bot with backend APIs to automate service notifications and user actions.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for creating 'Otis', an automation tool that streamlined internal support workflows, significantly improving team efficiency.

projects.name: AdCognition – End-to-End ML Ad Detection System
projects.description: Engineered a production Chrome extension for real-time ad detection linked to a Python/TensorFlow training stack. The system automates the ML pipeline from training and model conversion to deployment.
highlights: Built ML pipeline: Python training → TFJS export → Chrome extension deployment.
Implemented Flask services for model hosting, conversion, and monitoring via TensorBoard.

projects.name: MARS5 TTS Telegram Bot
projects.description: Telegram bot for cloning voice from audio inputs using CambAI MARS5 API. Demonstrates Python backend development, external API integration, and containerized deployment.
highlights: Implemented a production bot using Python and the Telegram Bot API.
Containerized the application using Docker for streamlined deployment and management.

projects.name: Otis – Customer Support Automation Tool
projects.description: Internal JavaScript tool for templating, form filling, and email generation to automate repetitive support tasks. Winner of the CGS Romania Innovation Contest.
highlights: Significantly improved team efficiency through process automation.
Demonstrated practical problem-solving and workflow optimization.
